Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk compat-grilo02
exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: rhythmbox, gom, grilo, totem, libdmapsharing, compat-grilo02 update
Vulnerability.Description: Rhythmbox is an integrated music management application based on the GStreamer media framework. The gom packages provide an object mapper from GObjects to SQLite. They help to write applications that need to store structured data as well as make complex queries upon that data. Grilo is a framework that provides access to different sources of multimedia content, using a pluggable system. The grilo package contains the core library and elements. The grilo-plugins package contains plugins for grilo to get information from these sources: Apple Trailers Bookmarks Euronews Filesystem Flickr Freebox Gravatar iTunes Music Sharing Jamendo Last.fm Local Metadata Metadata Store Pocket Podcasts Radio France Shoutcast The Guardian Videos Tracker Vimeo Youtube The totem packages contain a movie player that uses the GStreamer multimedia framework to play back films and music. It features a simple playlist, a full-screen mode, seek and volume controls, as well as complete keyboard navigation. The totem-pl-parser library is a library for parsing and saving playlists as used in music and movie players. The libdmapsharing packages implement DMAP (Digital Media Access Protocol) and provide client and server library for the protocol. The library implements DMAP. This also includes support for DAAP (Digital Audio Access Protocol) and DPAP (Digital Photo Access Protocol). The compat-grilo02 package is a compatibility package with grilo 0.2 libraries. The rhythmbox packages have been updated to version 3.4.1, the gom packages to version 0.3.2, the grilo packages to version 0.3.3, the grilo-plugins packages to version 0.3.4, the totem packages to version 3.22.1, the totem-pl-parser packages to version 3.10.7, and the libdmapsharing packages to version 2.9.37. In addition, this update adds the compat-grilo02 package to Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 Release Notes linked from the References section. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
